result.arabic_text: وَٱلطُّورِ
result.translation: (1) By the mount

result.arabic_text: وَكِتَٰبٖ مَّسۡطُورٖ
result.translation: (2) And [by] a Book inscribed[1550]
result.footnotes: [1550]- Interpreted as the Preserved Slate or possibly the Qur’ān.

result.arabic_text: فِي رَقّٖ مَّنشُورٖ
result.translation: (3) In parchment spread open

result.arabic_text: وَٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ
result.translation: (4) And [by] the frequented House[1551]
result.footnotes: [1551]- The house of worship for the angels in the seventh heaven, comparable to the Kaʿbah on earth.

result.arabic_text: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ
result.translation: (5) And [by] the ceiling [i.e., heaven] raised high

result.arabic_text: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
result.translation: (6) And [by] the sea set on fire,[1552]
result.footnotes: [1552]- On the Day of Resurrection.  Or "the sea which has overflowed."

result.arabic_text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
result.translation: (7) Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

result.arabic_text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٖ
result.translation: (8) Of it there is no preventer.

result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا
result.translation: (9) On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

result.arabic_text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَيۡرٗا
result.translation: (10) And the mountains will pass on, departing[1553] -
result.footnotes: [1553]- Becoming dust and moving as clouds.

result.arabic_text: فَوَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
result.translation: (11) Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
result.translation: (12) Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
result.translation: (13) The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

result.arabic_text: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
result.translation: (14) "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

result.arabic_text: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
result.translation: (15) Then is this magic, or do you not see?

result.arabic_text: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: (16) [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ
result.translation: (17) Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

result.arabic_text: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
result.translation: (18) Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

result.arabic_text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: (19) [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

result.arabic_text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
result.translation: (20) They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
result.translation: (21) And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds.[1554] Every person, for what he earned, is retained.[1555]
result.footnotes:
[1554]- i.e., the reward thereof.
[1555]- i.e., subject or held responsible.  Literally, "a hostage."

result.arabic_text: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
result.translation: (22) And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

result.arabic_text: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
result.translation: (23) They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

result.arabic_text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
result.translation: (24) There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

result.arabic_text: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
result.translation: (25) And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

result.arabic_text: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
result.translation: (26) They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allāh].

result.arabic_text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
result.translation: (27) So Allāh conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

result.arabic_text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
result.translation: (28) Indeed, we used to supplicate[1556] Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

result.arabic_text: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
result.translation: (29) So remind, [O Muḥammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
result.translation: (30) Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time"?[1557]
result.footnotes: [1557]- i.e., some accident or inevitable death.

result.arabic_text: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
result.translation: (31) Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
result.translation: (32) Or do their minds[1558] command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
result.footnotes: [1558]- In this expression is also a subtle allusion to the leaders of the Quraysh, who considered themselves to be great minds.

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: (33) Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

result.arabic_text: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
result.translation: (34) Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ
result.translation: (35) Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
result.translation: (36) Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ
result.translation: (37) Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
result.translation: (38) Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority [i.e., proof].

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
result.translation: (39) Or has He daughters while you have sons?

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
result.translation: (40) Or do you, [O Muḥammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
result.translation: (41) Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
result.translation: (42) Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

result.arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: (43) Or have they a deity other than Allāh? Exalted is Allāh above whatever they associate with Him.

result.arabic_text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
result.translation: (44) And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling,[1559] they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
result.footnotes: [1559]- Marking the onset of Allāh's punishment, as they had requested.

result.arabic_text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
result.translation: (45) So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
result.translation: (46) The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

result.arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: (47) And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment[1560] before that, but most of them do not know.
result.footnotes: [1560]- If not in this world, in the grave.

result.arabic_text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
result.translation: (48) And be patient, [O Muḥammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes [i.e., sight]. And exalt [Allāh] with praise of your Lord when you arise

result.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
result.translation: (49) And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
